title: Discovering the forest
creator_credit: Encyclopaedia Britannica Films and Thomas Smith
brief_description: Presents the story of the forest community; discussing its conditions, forms of life and inter-relationships. The mood of the forest is established through its own atmosphere, sounds and life - there is no narration. Designed to encourage children to observe, and then interpret their observations.
